description:
System76 releases the Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS distribution based on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS with the Rust-based COSMIC Alpha desktop environment. Here's what's new!

The post System76 Launches Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS with COSMIC Alpha Desktop Environment appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: System76 Launches Pop!_OS 24.04 LTS with COSMIC Alpha Desktop Environment

description:
TUXEDO InfinityFlex 14 is now available for pre-order as TUXEDO Computers's first convertible Linux laptop featuring a 360-degree touchscreen. Now available for pre-order from $1000 USD.

The post TUXEDO Computers Unveils Their First 3-in-1 Convertible Linux Laptop appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: TUXEDO Computers Unveils Their First 3-in-1 Convertible Linux Laptop
